description:
go-tour: remove last slide memory

I've had a few reports that this is confusing. Maybe it could come back
at some point in another form (eg, "Welcome back! Do you want to resume
from where you left off?").

messages.text:

go-tour: remove last slide memory

I've had a few reports that this is confusing. Maybe it could come back
at some point in another form (eg, "Welcome back! Do you want to resume
from where you left off?").
